entry.def: Food that is fattening is considered to make people fat easily.

example.ex: Some foods are more fattening than others.
example.tran: 有些食物比其他食物更容易使人发胖。

means.word_mean: 1. subject to or used in the process of finishing or fattening up for slaughter;

auth_sentence.content: But fructose may be more fattening than glucose.

sentences.en: I’m trying to lose weight so I have to steer clear of fattening foods.
sentences.cn: 我想減肥,所以得避免吃增肥食品。

sentences.en: We substitute margarine for cream because cream is fattening.
sentences.cn: 我们用人造黄油代替奶油,因为奶油会使人发胖。
